text: Southern Comfort is a 1981 American action adventure thriller movie directed by Walter Hill and starring Keith Carradine, Powers Boothe, Fred Ward, Franklyn Seales, Peter Coyote, T. K. Carter, Lewis Smith. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1981 action movies Category:1981 adventure movies Category:1981 thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Swiss action movies Category:Swiss adventure movies Category:Swiss thriller movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies directed by Walter Hill Category:Movies set in Louisiana Category:Movies set in forests Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in the 1970s
title: Southern Comfort (movie)
